rating_comment: We booked this place to attend a wedding in Dhaka. Shamim was a super host, very accommodating and was willing to go beyond to resolve our issues and ensured our comfortable stay. Place is spacious with good size beds and living area. Perfect for a family stay. Building has Top notch security. The best thing about this place is its location. Deffo best location to be in when you're in dhaka, close to everything. Will deffo stay there in future when we're in Dhaka.
